item.title: caffe
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: Install http://caffe.berkeleyvision.org/installation.html macos install caffe #!/bin/sh # Install brew /usr/bin/ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" # Apple hides old versions of stuff at https://developer.apple.com/download/more/ # Install the latest XCode (8.0). # We used to install the XCode Command Line Tools 7.3 here, but that would just upset the most recent versions of brew. # So we're going to install all our brew dependencies first, and then downgrade the tools. You can switch back after # you have installed caffe.
